name: Close the Vent (Among Us Inspired)
description:
Close the vent before the kill timer hits five.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

--

Among Us Inspired.
I used CuteC3's sprite for the player and enemy and free assets for the other materials. This project is just to test the basic function of construct 3 game maker.
